sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Royalty Management Holding Corporation Enters Into Milestone Agreement to Invest in Intellectual Property Development at ReElement Technologies Corporation
feed.summary: Royalty Management Holding Corporation (RMCO) has announced a landmark agreement with ReElement Technologies Corporation to fund the development of new technologies and intellectual property in rare earth and critical element processing. ReElement will develop novel refining methods, with RMCO receiving a 0.5% royalty on gross sales from elements refined using these new patents. This partnership aims to provide cost-effective and environmentally friendly alternatives to traditional refining methods for critical materials.

feed.title: Royalty Management Holdings Company targets shareholder value through asset cashflows
feed.summary: Royalty Management Holdings Corporation (NASDAQ: RMCO) aims to build shareholder value by acquiring and developing high-value assets across various market environments, focusing on monetizing existing cashflow streams and identifying future transitionary cashflows. The company recently announced plans to invest in SAGINT to advance blockchain-based commodity traceability and reported strong third-quarter 2025 performance driven by its portfolio of resource-driven and technology-focused royalty assets. RMCO also restructured a subsidiary to create "The Vault Holding Corporation," focusing on monetizing assets in datacenter, AI servers, and alternative currency mining sectors.

feed.title: Royalty Management Holding Corporation Announces the Creation of Datacenter, AI, and Alternative Currency Mining Division: The Vault Holding Corporation
feed.summary: Royalty Management Holding Corporation (RMCO) has established "The Vault Holding Corporation," a new subsidiary focused on datacenter, AI, and alternative currency mining. This strategic move aims to consolidate RMCO's investments in this high-growth sector, leveraging attractive sites with favorable electricity rates and infrastructure for capital deployment and revenue generation. The Vault will pursue growth through leasing assets, deploying its own equipment for mining, and acquiring new assets and properties in the sector.

feed.title: Royalty Management Holding Corporation Provides Funds for Additional Development and Mineral Analysis at Its Jamaican Critical Mineral Investment
feed.summary: Royalty Management Holding Corporation (RMCO) has invested additional capital for the development and mineral analysis of its Jamaican critical mineral investment. This funding aims to progress the operating permit for TR Mining & Equipment Ltd.'s vanadium, titanium, magnetite, and iron ore mine and to conduct further sampling to identify other rare earth elements and critical minerals. RMCO holds a 10.0% royalty on all minerals and products from the 25 square kilometer permit area, which contains over 212 million tons of raw sand and ore.

feed.title: Royalty Management Holding Corporation’s Investment in Ferrox Holdings Ltd Provides Initial Production and Revenue Guidance
feed.summary: Royalty Management Holding Corporation announced that its investment holding, Ferrox Holdings Ltd., has begun production at its Tivani mining project in South Africa. The project is producing Titanium, Iron, and Vanadium ores, with an anticipated full-year revenue of $8 million in 2025. Ferrox plans to continuously increase production and expand its product offerings, creating significant value for Royalty Management Holding and its shareholders.

feed.title: Royalty Management announces $2 million stock buyback By Investing.com
feed.summary: Royalty Management Holding Corporation announced a $2 million stock repurchase program, authorized by its Board of Directors. The program will allow the company to buy back Class A Common Shares over the next 24 months, aiming to enhance shareholder value. CEO Thomas Sauve highlighted the company's confidence in its operations and royalty holdings despite the stock trading near its 52-week low.

feed.title: Royalty Management Holding Corporation Completes Strategic Acquisition of Diversified Resource-Based for Long Term Royalty Stream
feed.summary: Royalty Management Holding Corporation (RMCO) has acquired a perpetual royalty stream linked to a diversified natural resource deposit in Jamaica. This acquisition focuses on the production and sale of high-value Titanium Dioxide, Iron Ore, and Vanadium, further aligning with RMCO's strategy to invest in resources vital for energy transition and modern infrastructure. The company plans to begin resource extraction permitting and conduct further ore testing for additional valuable elements.
